context.p: If users need to change the License Key, please follow below steps.

note.p: License Key is know as the Activation Code before the TXOne Stellar version 2.1.

step.cmd: Contact your support provider for a new license key.
After you receive the new license key, go to Administration License , and click New License button.
Input the new license key and click Save.
A message with The License is activated successfully appears. As a result, the Last Updated item now shows the date and time the license was updated.
